column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We had a really nice dinner here. Our server was helpful and attentive when we needed him to be
column2: but allowed us to take our time ordering and to enjoy the experience of the food. The cocktails were nicely balanced
column3: all of the entrees were delicious
column4: and our salad was a great start to our meal. This restaurant is lowly lit and the music accompanied our conversation perfectly. I would have to throw out a word of caution about the valet - a big group started to collect outside of the Gilt Bar
column5: waiting for the valet guys even to be there to take our tickets. At first
column6: I thought it was because they were retrieving cars
column7: but that wasn't the case. Who knows where they were
column8: but when our cars finally came
column9: they sped up to the curb like they had just been racing.
